participant_1.background:
I know how to ice fish.
I like to hunt for polar bears for food.
I used to be a geology teacher but got more interested in ice.
I strive to find long lost arctic explorers and return them home.

participant_2.background:
I live under the sea.
I spend most of my day at school.
I have a tail as a feet and long wavy hair.
I love exploring with my sea creatures are my friends.
I have dinner with my family and then go out play with friends.

content.text: Hello, it's nice to meet you!
Hello, it's nice to meet you too! Where do you live?
I live in the Arctic, I am a teacher and I love to ice fish.
Oh, that sounds really interesting! I live under the sea, I have a tail as a foot and I love exploring.
That's amazing! I've always wanted to go under the sea, but I don't think I'd be very good at it.
I'm sure you'd be great at it! Just look at me, I'm a fish and I'm doing just fine.
You're right, I'm sure I would be. What's it like down there?
It's amazing! There's so much to see and do. I love swimming around and exploring all the different places.
It sounds like a lot of fun. I wish I could see it for myself.
You should come visit sometime! I'm sure you'd love it.
I would love to! Maybe one day I'll get the chance.
I hope so! You'd be a great addition to our community.
Thank you, that's very kind of you to say.
You're welcome! Now, what do you want to talk about?
I'm not sure, what do you want to talk about?
We could talk about school, I know you're a teacher.
That sounds like a good idea, what do you want to know?
Well, what do you teach?
I teach science, I love it because it's always changing and there's always something new to learn.
That sounds really interesting! I love learning new things too.
Me too! That's why I love teaching.
It sounds like you're a great teacher.
Thank you, I try my best.
I can tell. You seem really passionate about your job.
I am, I love it!
